body_html:
@facaiy The docs are inside cc file which defines reshape op.

To think of it, this approach would trigger an API review. I wonder if there's a simple solution which would only touch a couple of lines of Python code, better chance of being accepted without a lot of work on maintaining team. BTW, the best way to test things is to run all relevant tests locally first, using "bazel test"

body:
@facaiy The docs are inside cc file which defines reshape op.

To think of it, this approach would trigger an API review. I wonder if there's a simple solution which would only touch a couple of lines of Python code, better chance of being accepted without a lot of work on maintaining team. BTW, the best way to test things is to run all relevant tests locally first, using "bazel test"
